Comment: Susan Collins is one very, very slick, slippery politician. She knows just when to signal that she MIGHT be shifting to bring attention to herself and give hope to the Democrats that maybe there's a crack. She's done that with Supreme Court nominations, legislation, and "concern" over a number of issues. But at the very end, she does what she does EVERY single time, she votes with the Republicans. So Mainers now is the time to get her the hell out of there and put in somebody that will actually do something instead of just give you lip service and screw you at the 11th hour. If you live in Maine, give money to whoever is running against her and support him or her.
